roleset.name: cause interconnection/flow between 2 branching networks, having branched systems that connect, allowing flow between them

role.descr: entity arg1 is being connected to

example.name: with arg1, arg2
example.text: The lower end of the biliopancreatic limb is then anastomosed to the terminal ileum.
example.arg: The lower end of the biliopancreatic limb

example.name: arg1
example.text: In the meantime , we have a known recurrence in the pelvis that is anastomotic as best we can tell .
